pages.text:
Our Leadership Team
Daniel A. Hostettler
President & Chief Executive Officer, The Boca Raton
President & Chief Executive Officer Daniel A. Hostettler is guiding The Boca Raton’s evolution into an unrivaled luxury resort destination. With 25 years of luxury hotel, restaurant and private club experience, he directs the strategic and business vision for the reimagining of The Boca Raton.
Read More
Tamara Savatic
Chief of Staff to the President and Vice President, Customer Experience
With a background that spans decades of expertise in law, finance, and hospitality, Tamara Savatic is the consummate professional to lead the operations of The Boca Raton in her role as Chief of Staff to the President and Vice President, Customer Experience.
Read More
Tami Thraum
Chief Financial Officer
With over 25 years of success leading strategic, operational, and financial functions, Tami Thraum brings an unmatched background to her role as Chief Financial Officer at The Boca Raton—one that’s poised to drive both top- and bottom-line growth.
Read More
Maria Burns-Aladro
Chief Human Resources Officer
In her role as Chief Human Resources Officer, Maria Burns-Aladro understands people bring The Boca Raton’s brand to life. Beyond initial hiring, Burns-Aladro focuses on mentoring employees—ensuring they are valued and listened to, and encourages innovation and collaboration.
Read More
Hayley McCraney
Chief People & Culture Officer
For Hayley McCraney, success starts behind the scenes. As The Boca Raton’s Chief People & Culture Officer, McCraney brings her vast experience in hospitality and training to the storied property, furthering its legacy of service and authenticity.
Read More
Corinne Heyl
Vice President, Hotel Operations
A luxury hospitality leader with international hotel prowess, Corinne Heyl is Vice President, Hotel Operations overseeing the hotels located Harborside. Her commitment to achieving high levels of personalization is achieved by paying consistent attention to detail.
Read More
Nancy Sergio
Vice President, Catering and Banquet Operations
In her longtime role leading catering and conference services, Nancy Sergio has embraced a creative spirit and sky’s-the-limit approach, resulting in extraordinary events that have captured the imagination of countless Club members and guests.
Read More
Andrew Roenbeck
Vice President, Culinary Operations – Group Executive Chef
In his three decades at The Boca Raton, Andrew Roenbeck’s culinary philosophy has produced a high standard across the property’s multitude of dining options. “Food should be bright, light, beautiful, and give a sense of place,” a belief that – along with a dedication to his craft – has catapulted Roenbeck into the esteemed role of Vice President of Culinary Operations.
Read More
Jennifer Ottmann
Vice President, Food and Beverage
Simply put, Jennifer Ottmann’s role is to implement a vision. In her new position as Vice President, Food and Beverage, Ottmann is tasked with delivering more than an experience at each of the dining outlets at The Boca Raton; she’s here to make memories.
Read More
Timothy Holmes
Vice President, Revenue Management
Veteran hotel executive Timothy Holmes has a key slogan: “Always be ready.” It has come in handy as The Boca Raton’s Vice President, Revenue Management prepares and creates unique hotel offers and packages that speak to the customer. After spending nearly 11 years in New York City’s buzzing hotel business, Holmes has called The Boca Raton home for the past two decades.
Read More
Justin Ely
Vice President, Membership Sales
Upon reflection, it makes sense that his strong Midwest upbringing would give Justin Ely the right foundation to enjoy a career in South Florida. After all, it was in Cleveland, Ohio, where Ely developed his hospitable, family-oriented nature—values that The Boca Raton’s Vice President, Membership Sales carries today.
Read More
Antonia Korosec
Vice President, Resort Operations
A leader in international luxury hospitality, Antonia Korosec serves as Vice President, Resort Operations at The Boca Raton. Korosec’s more than 20 years of experience strengthens her ability to oversee multiple departments that impact the member and guest experience.
Read More
Ekrem Koroglu
Vice President and General Manager, Beach Club
With his deep commitment to transformative travel experiences, Ekrem Koroglu brings an inspired approach to hospitality as Vice President and General Manager of the re-energized Beach Club, The Boca Raton’s luxury oceanfront hotel.
Read More
Joe Glasgow
Vice President, Marketing & Commercial Strategy
As the property’s Vice President, Marketing & Commercial Strategy, Glasgow brings a passion for analytical precision and delivering meaningful guest experiences—shaped by his decade-long tenure at The Walt Disney Company, as well as his most recent time with Holiday Inn Club Vacations leading the marketing and strategy teams.
Read More
Richard Horshington
Senior Financial Advisor to the President & Chief Executive Officer
With nearly four decades in hospitality as a financial executive, Richard Horshington’s path to becoming The Boca Raton’s Senior Financial Advisor to the President & Chief Executive Officer adds up perfectly. Throughout his career, the consummate professional has been instrumental in creating strategies and initiatives that maximize revenue, including at hotel groups with revenues in excess of $400 million as well as managing capital budgets in excess of $50 million.
Read More

Explore Meeting Venues
Inquire
Lead, Inspire, and Come Together
Meetings & Events
Elevate Your Next Professional Event
The Boca Raton is a storied setting for sparking innovation. With a range of exceptional venues, incredible dining options, and years of experience creating remarkable moments, events are brighter, bolder, and more memorable at The Boca Raton.
60+
Meeting & Event Spaces
97,000+
Total Sq Ft
10 - 1200
Maximum Capacity
The Boca Raton was Named the 38th Top Meeting Hotel in North America by Cvent.
Conferences & Events
Exceptional at every scale, The Boca Raton has the capabilities to seamlessly host unforgettably grand gatherings. From large keynote sessions to individual breakout rooms, each experience is carefully curated to accommodate, astound, and engage.
Flexible Meeting Spaces
On- and Off-Property Group Programming
World-Class Catering
Designated Design and Production Team
INQUIRE
Intimate Meetings
A perfect setting for an intimate professional gathering, The Boca Raton’s range of venues are perfectly designed for any scale, including private dining rooms in our various notable restaurants and a selection of indoor and outdoor settings throughout the property.
Large and small scale meeting spaces
Private dining rooms at restaurants
Private Yacht Charter, Top Tracer Golf Experience, and more
INQUIRE
Professional Retreats
Build a stronger foundation at The Boca Raton – a property with a century of history and success. Explore, indulge, and grow together at our various amenities, activities, and more.
Unparalleled accommodations
Team Building Activities
